data.text: Abiro paki e dier ogendini, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Nikech herani maduongʼ chopo nyaka e polo;
Nyingi mondo otingʼ malo moyombo polo, yaye Nyasaye,
Reswa kendo konywa gi lweti ma korachwich,
Nyasaye osewuoyo gie kare maler kowacho niya,
Gilead en mara, Manase bende mara,
Moab en besen mara mar luok,
En ngʼa mabiro kela e dala maduongʼ mochiel motegno?
Donge in ema isedagiwa, yaye Nyasaye,
Wabiro loyo lweny ka Nyasaye nikodwa,
